attributes.long-description:
Nothing turns out quite as expected when an interstellar bus ride transforms into an eccentric journey. A young boy becomes stranded on a remote robot planet and the struggle to find a bus that will take him home begins.

-Experience 12+ hours of retro adventuring
-Locate over 100 secrets spanning 22 different locations
-Five smart and thrilling boss battles
-Travel with a friend in 2 player couch co-op mode

Immerse yourself in the visually-stunning world of Pid. Overcome spectacular obstacles while you hone your gaming abilities through gravity-bending action, intricate puzzle-solving and classic precision platform action.

1-2 players
2MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

Copyright © 2011 Might and Delight AB
attributes.name: Pid
